content: @Shnatsel can I nominate a crate? (inout) https://github.com/RustCrypto/utils/pull/755

Sure! Although safety-dance is more about removing unnecessary unsafe than about soundness. But, I know that #dark-arts on Rust Community Discord as well as the Stacked Borrows Debate Club there have been looking at inout.
A big issue with submitting fixes is that it's kinda hard to convince maintainers to merge them. If you show up and say that you're willing to merge fixes and are in general soliciting reviews, I think you'll get them.
https://discord.gg/rust-lang-community is the invite link in case you need one
